dialog.text: Well, that does I quit!  I managed to show my work to Tanya and she ripped into it:  “You need a comment here Alice”, “where’s the test case Alice?”, “this should be an if not a while Alice”.  I was so close to tears!  Do you think I should quit?

joins.text: You're a barrel of confidence - cheers!
Well, I won't if you say so.

dialog.text: Got a lovely glass of wine and not going to think about work now until tomorrow.  Are you studying this weekend?
Totally chill - that's what I say.  Hopefully Pete will be home early tonight and we can get a take-out.  Going to go and watch Community on Netflix now, catch you later!
